title: Stadia Changelog: Google officially commits to over 100 games in 2022, Risk of Rain 2 details expansion
content:
Stadia’s start to 2022 has been without a goal, but that’s finally changing this week as Google has officially committed to bringing at least 100 new games to Stadia by the end of the year.

more…

The post Stadia Changelog: Google officially commits to over 100 games in 2022, Risk of Rain 2 details expansion appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has finally confirmed that, like last year, Stadia will get at least 100 new games over the course of 2022.
